response.overview: Délices plays on the overlapping of images which, through the pulse of rapid editing, interweave in a graphic and colorful shimmer. Those fluid images combine a body with natural elements in a slow and continuous camera movement. A journey between images, between two worlds, that is symbolically represented by the presence of fish as a link between the surface and the unknown depths of the liquid element : between the conscious and the unconscious.
response.title: Délices
